name: Piggy bank !
description:
Piggy Bank ! is a small puzzle game where you control a tiny piggy bank that must reach the flag. You’ll have to think and find the shortest way to the flag, because each time you make a move, you lose a coin and your little piggy bank won’t do it if it’s empty..!

Controls :

  • ZQSD or ←↓↑→ to move around.
  • Escape for pause menu.
  • R to restart level.
  • f10 to unlock all levels.

Team :

• Flavien Rombouts  : programmer, U.I. designer 

→ https://www.artstation.com/flavien

• Alice Doyen  : 3D artist, animator

→ https://www.artstation.com/alice_doyen_holberry

• Valentin Boyaval : team leader, level designer, level artist, programmer

→  https://www.artstation.com/cromach

• Valentin Liebaert : programmer, 3D artist, level artist

→  https://www.artstation.com/liebaert

• Quentin Eudeline : game designer, F.X. artist, 3D artist, sound designer 

→ https://www.artstation.com/quentineudeline

Tools : 3ds Max, Maya, Unity, Substance Painter, Audition, Photoshop

Made in 48hs during Ludum Dare 44 ("Your life is currency")
